reviewText: This is an awesome moveie about the life of Jews. Covers allot about them from beginning to becoming a nation. Very well done.
GREAT MUSICAL PRESENTATION!!! Better than I expected. YES!
amazing talent, amazing music....met and exceeded expectations!
Very good. I enjoy hearing stories from different ethnic and cultural groups of people. Especially the true, historic ones. The musical was entertaining and enlightening for me.
I LOVE ALL OF THE DIFFERENT VERSIONS AND STORY'S OF THE BIBLE. GOD BLESS YOU ALL. AND MAY THERE BE TRUE SHALOM EVERYWHERE.
I can never get enough from reading GOD's word and to see it done in song was so beautiful.  I was very happy about the way it was done.  Thank you for staying on track with the WORD.

This musical is such a beautiful summary of the story of God and his people starting with Abraham.  My kids have grasped the big picture of the story in a wonderful way because of this video. The songs are stunning.  This is well worth its price!

While I may be unlike most people, when I read the words 'musical drama' I was thinking it was an actual movie like Seven Brides for Seven Brothers and the like.  This is a well done for what it is, but it is basically a mega-church play that has been professionally filmed.  The talent is good, but like I said, I was expecting an actual movie.

I actually bought this for my Mum and Dad who like this kind of stuff, but the musical performance is really interesting and beautiful. The one that I got is actually the Jerusalem 2004 version which is my preferred one with a cast of over 70 singers and dancers. A great introduction to the story of Abraham, Israel and the history of the State of Israel.
